titles.title: A resolution to authorize printing of additional copies of a Senate document.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/19/1988--Introduced. Provides for the printing as a Senate Document of "Accomplishments of the 100th Congress: Report by the Senate Democratic Policy Committee." Authorizes additional printing of such document for the use of the Senate.
